name: Forist
description:
Note: Forist is currently in BETA (expect a few bugs here and there.) Updates will be pushed out throughout the game's lifetime to make it more balanced, and make it more fun.         

The Game

Forist is an FPS survival game, where you are placed in a forest, and must defend yourself from the zombies using your gun to survive. 

The Story

You were on your way to school, when you took a wrong turn, and ended up in a forest. Some weird cube like creatures started to appear, you quickly started looking for a weapon to defend himself. And out of nowhere he found a gun laying on the ground. Now you must survive the forest and defeat the monsters and stop them from destroying the world. Are you willing to help save the world??

Controls
  • WASD to move
  • right click to fire
  • mouse to turn camera
  • escape to pause
Objective
  • Kill all the enemies to increase your score
  • Dont die
  • Have fun
